name: Circus Watch Faces
tagline: Circus Watch Faces for Android Wear - Design by Roberta Pagnoni
body:
# Circus Watch Faces

Circus Watch Faces for Android Wear

A beautiful collection of hand drawn Circus Watch Faces for your Android Wear smartwatch The unique style of Roberta Pagnoni, a leading contemporary childrenâ€™s book illustrator, can now be enjoyed on your Android Wear smartwatch with a beautiful collection of five analog watch faces, each one presenting a special circus character. The Watch Faces are:
  • Acrobats
  • Juggler
  • Equilibrist
  • Seal
  • Elephant
and hopefully more to come! Each Watch Face is animated and they are also optimized for the ambient mode, if your smartwatch supports it! Discover their unique way to mark the time! All illustrations are hand made by Roberta Pagnoni: robertapagnoni.it The app is free and can be downloaded from the Google Play Store and from the Amazon App Store
